Network

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Network.Station
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlusStation, StandardStation

    public abstract class Station
extends java.util.Observable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBike(Bike bike)
      Adds a bike to the station, if possible, and puts it in the first free parking slot
      void addParkingSlot(ParkingSlot parkingSlot) 
      void addUser(User user)
      Adds an user to the observers of the station, should be done every time a User sets this station as a destination
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object station) 
      GPSCoordinate getCoordinates() 
      java.util.ArrayList<ParkingSlot> getFreeSlots()
      Returns the ArrayList of free slots in the station
      void getFull()
      When the station gets full, it notifies its observers, then removes them from the observers list, and changes its status
      int getID() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      int getNumberOfSpots() 
      java.util.ArrayList<ParkingSlot> getParkingSlots() 
      java.util.ArrayList<ParkingSlot> getSlotsWithElectricalBike()
      Returns the slots (not out of order) that have a Electrical bike
      java.util.ArrayList<ParkingSlot> getSlotsWithMechanicalBike()
      Returns the slots (not out of order) that have a Mechanical bike
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers() 
      void giveBackBike(User user)
      This function checks if it is possible to give back a bike, but it should not be necessary as that verification should be done beforehand It also checks if the User has a bike to give back, then removes it from the User, and it puts the bike in the first available free ParkingSlot
      void giveTimeCredit(User u)
      This method will be used to add time credit in the case of a Plus Station, but should do nothing if it is a Standard Station
      void goOffline()
      When the station goes offline, it notifies its observers, then removes them from the observers list, and changes its status
      boolean isFull() 
      boolean isOnline() 
      void notifyUsers(java.lang.String message)
      Notifies the users if the station goes offline or gets full.
      int numberOfElectricalBike()
      Returns the number of (available) electrical bikes
      int numberOfFreeSpots()
      Returns the number of free spots at the station
      int numberOfKindBike(Bike bike)
      Returns the number of bikes of the same type as the bike given as an argument
      int numberOfMechanicalBike()
      Returns the number of (available) mechanical bikes
      void removeUser(User user)
      Removes an user, should be done every time an user of this station gives back his bike, whether it is at this station or not
      void setCoordinates(GPSCoordinate coordinates) 
      void setFull(boolean full) 
      void setName(java.lang.String name) 
      void setParkingSlots(java.util.ArrayList<ParkingSlot> parkingSlots) 
      void setStatus(boolean status) 
      void setUsers(java.util.ArrayList<User> users) 
      void takeBike(Bike bike, User user)
      This function allows a User to take a bike of the wanted type, it will check if such a bike is available (even though that should be done beforehand), and returns a bike of the wanted type.

      • giveTimeCredit

        public void giveTimeCredit(User u)
        This method will be used to add time credit in the case of a Plus Station, but should do nothing if it is a Standard Station
        Parameters:
        u -

      • addUser

        public void addUser(User user)
        Adds an user to the observers of the station, should be done every time a User sets this station as a destination

      • removeUser

        public void removeUser(User user)
        Removes an user, should be done every time an user of this station gives back his bike, whether it is at this station or not

      • notifyUsers

        public void notifyUsers(java.lang.String message)
        Notifies the users if the station goes offline or gets full. The users should then be removed.

      • goOffline

        public void goOffline()
        When the station goes offline, it notifies its observers, then removes them from the observers list, and changes its status

      • getFull

        public void getFull()
        When the station gets full, it notifies its observers, then removes them from the observers list, and changes its status

        public int numberOfKindBike(Bike bike)
        Returns the number of bikes of the same type as the bike given as an argument
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • giveBackBike

        public void giveBackBike(User user)
        This function checks if it is possible to give back a bike, but it should not be necessary as that verification should be done beforehand It also checks if the User has a bike to give back, then removes it from the User, and it puts the bike in the first available free ParkingSlot

      • takeBike

        public void takeBike(Bike bike,
                     User user)
        This function allows a User to take a bike of the wanted type, it will check if such a bike is available (even though that should be done beforehand), and returns a bike of the wanted type. The String condition will be quite strict : "electrical" or "mechanical" only, be careful when you call it. If there is no bike of the wanted type, a new beginning station will be calculated
        Parameters:
        bikeType -
